channel.title: The Totally Rad Show
channel.description: THE TOTALLY RAD SHOW. Hosted by Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg and Jeff Cannata. The Totally Rad Show is the summer blockbuster of geek news shows. Every week, hosts Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, and Jeff Cannata rip into the world of movies, video games, tv, comics, and more and pull out what's rad.

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 760: The Totally Rad Show - Final Episode
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 760: The Totally Rad Show - Final Episode
item.description:
In the final TRS of all time, we award the Uber-Raddies and share the best game, movie, and TV show we've reviewed in the last 6 years.
Topics: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata
item.media:keywords: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 758: Totally Rad Show: A Look Back - Thanksgiving
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 758: Totally Rad Show: A Look Back - Thanksgiving
item.description:
Though the show is coming to an end, there is one thing we must say: Thank you, thank you, thank you, thank you.

item.title: The Totally Rad Show 754: Life of Pi - Movie Review
item.media:title: The Totally Rad Show 754: Life of Pi - Movie Review
item.description:
Life of Pi, based on the fantasy adventure novel by Yann Martel, stars an unknown as the lead and a Bengal tiger. Could a spiritual tale with no American stars be the new front-runner for this year's Best Picture?
Topics: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata
item.media:keywords: revision3, rev3, trs, The Totally Rad Show, Alex Albrecht, Dan Trachtenberg, Jeff Cannata
